properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 4 at 3:32PM EST until January 5 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, Northwest winds 15 to 20 kt with
gusts up to 35 kt expected. For the Small Craft Advisory,
Northwest winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt expected.

* WHERE...New York Harbor.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 6 AM to 6 PM EST Sunday. For
the Small Craft Advisory, from midnight tonight to 6 AM EST
Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM EST SUNDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM EST SUNDAY... ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
